content.rendered:
Ground Okra are raw materials for soups, sauces … Frozen Ground Okra is made from fresh okra, they are pureed and frozen at a negative temperature of 40 to minus 35 degrees Celsius.

Fresh okra are picked and washing

Fresh okra are removed stem

Frozen Ground Okra

excerpt.rendered: Ground Okra are raw materials for soups, sauces … Frozen Ground Okra is made from fresh okra, they are pureed…
